content.detailedDescription: I was at my dads house in jackson where i live. i went outside to go to thegarage, looked up because there was lightning and saw this white sphere thatkind of resembled a star in luminance. i thought it was a falling star untilit started making a humming sound like a motor,then all the sudden the soundwas high pitched. then it took off with a blue trail behind it and i heard afaint bang sound.I didnt have time to get a camera, so i went over the scenarioa few times in my head so i would remember the experience as vividly aspossible. i was pretty calm through the whole thing. after it took off i raninside and told my dad and brother that i just saw a ufo above the garrage.I felt elated because this was the closest ive ever been to a ufo.Me and a close friend had seen something very similar about a year ago.It was on a trip to clarksdale, ms about 3000 ft in the sky and silver,sphere shaped and it took off at about the same speed as this one.It was daytime and we didnt notice any trails or sound.
content.summary: Sphere shaped ufo seen in jackson, ms

content.detailedDescription: We were walking along a sidewalk in an east to west direction at about 11 pm.Rob happened to look straight overhead and called our attention to two small,fuzzy objects, close together. they were closer together than the stars inorions sword and about as bright, but a little larger. the fuzziness could havebeen due to the somewhat humid conditions. although moving east3e west at a very high speed and, what appeared to be a very high altitude, theywere criss-crossing each other in a figure 8 fashion. they moved from directlyoverhead to about 70 degrees above the horizon in about 3-4 seconds. at thatpoint, they disappeared behind a hazy cloud. my wife, always skeptical aboutufos is not so skeptical any more i am a computer professional in a local schooldistrict and rob is a history teacher in a middle school. my wife was employedas a teachertechnician in an elementary media center at the time.

I was reading the allagash abductions and noted that in the 1970s, there werereported ufo landings near the brattleboro vermont area. in 1954 or 1955, mycousin and i had a frightning experience which we thought was quite natural.I was spending the summer on my relatives farm in hinsdale, new hampshire, whichis just across the connecticut river from brattleboro, vt. we went into thewoods on the farm to repair a broken cow fence. while there near the fence, anelectrical storm came up. we saw a bright flash of light and i was knockedunconscious for several minutes. when i came to, i was sitting against a tree,paralyzed but recovering ok. it seemed like when your foot falls asleep, exceptit was my whole body. my cousin eddy was running around literaly bouncing offtrees. we assumed that we had been struck by lightning.My question is, were there any ufo sightings in the brattleboro vt. area between1954 and 1956 in the book i read were pictures of marks the men had recieved onthier legs called chop marks. i have these marks which appeared after aninfection on my right chin area two years ago. after the scabs fell off, theyleft those small gouges in my leg this is not a ufo sighting report, just aniquiry thank you kevin p. moran-torrguy@aol.Com

I was in baltimore with my girlfriend  was taking a picture of the hotel we werestaying in. we were on the 11th floor, i was outside on the ground i raised mycamera up to take a picture of our room  didnt notice anything until i had thefilm developed now would like to know what they might be. if ya could tell mewhere to submit the photo  if ya blow it up you can see there are alot ofobjects in the photo.. thank you

Event occured while i was taking trash out to curb at my home at night. therewere no stars out, and clouds had a slight glow from ground lights. there wereno other weather effects. the night was cool, but not uncomfortable without ajacket.When i was about 5 meters from curb with the two cans, i looked directlyoverhead for no reason i can remember. i saw a formation of lights, the roundones in the center being about twice the width of my thumb at arm-length. theouter lights were dimmer than the center three. they all were of about the samesize. they were aligned east-west. the spacing between them was about 34 to 1diameter of each light, and was constant for all of them. to the north and southwere two bands of light of the same intensity. the general formation was------.2b      2b  .------1  2  3  4  5  6  7the  .  lights were very dim, and i was never very sure if they were there. the2b  were discernable, but dimmer than the center three   . all appeared to bethe same size, and were circular in shape. the diagram above is to indicatebrightness, not size.The two bands of light that paralleled the circular lights were about the samediameter, and fadded out beyond lights 3  5, and were gone beyond lights 2  6.The fading seemed to make the appear somewhat curved toward the circular lights.The diagram above is to indicate the fading, not thickness.The above observations lasted about 10 - 15 seconds.I had no reference to judge height, but the impression i had was it was notgreater than 150 meters.I had a sudden urge to finish taking out the trash, that in the few seconds thatthat would take, it would not disappear loss of mental and physical control.When i returned to where i had seen the lights, they were gone. the curb wasunder some trees, blocking view of the object. to me, this action seemsirrational mental impairment, as all i had to do was put down the cans tocontinue observing. i scanned the visable sky, and saw nothing unusual.Upon returning indoors to my family, my mother asked why it had taken me over 15minutes to take out the trash. to me, it had been less than five minutes. i haveno memor

i was sitting on my front porch having a cigarette after dinner. i noticed an object above the trees that was not moving. i thought it was a plane but knew it couldnt be because of its reddish-orange color. i thought maybe it was the planet that is red we can see all the timevenus but then it moved slightly below its position towards the ground and then it quickly flew off in a horizontal line out of sightflew over house tops and and then my view was blocked. during the event, i just watched in disbelief and couldnt move my feet. then i came inside and told my fiance what i had just seen. i think i might have been in shock afterwords but am not sure. i am not a drinker nor do i partake in any kind of recreational drugs. i was a weather spotter for a county in ohio and i am an astronomy buff. so i know what i saw was not of the normal air traffic. the object was sphere-like and reddish-orange in color. as it moved slightly downward, it grew darker in color. a lighter orange to a darker orange as it moved down. then as it moved off out of sight it stayed darker in colorreddish-orange. i lost sight of the object because the building i live in was in the way. i am on the second floor. i still have a hard time believing what i saw. please help me understand what it could be. maybe you can figure it out.M tomasik

As i left a relatives house, alone, at one thirty am, i stoped at the top of hisdriveway, looking right, then left for traffic on a dark, country road.  as ilooked left, a row of bright, colored lights ascended above trees across theroad and about 150 yards distance. as i watched, the lights stopped just abovethe treetops.  the lights flashed brightly, in two pairs of colors, moving leftto right as, red, green white, red, green, white.  i rolled down the window ofthe car, but heard nothing, not even the typical night sounds, no crickets orother things.  thinking about what i had read to do if you spot a strange, ufolike object, i stuck my arm out and held my left index finger against thehovering lights.  they were as long as my finger at arms length, and just a tadthinner.For some reason which i still cannot understand, i decided to proceed to my lefton my usual route home, instead of running into the house to notify my relative. so i turned towards the lights, and as i did, they began to move south towardsme.  as i drove and got opposite their position, i looked up through mywindshield, at which time i saw them pass right overhead, looking brighter andlarger.  i did not look to my left to see where they had gone, and to this dayit is a disturbing thought.  why didnt i look  my next recollection is drivingon that road to the next street,about another half mile, where i would make aright turn.  i was only what seemed to be a few feet from the location where theoverflight had taken place, but all i could say to myself was, whats thegoodyear blimp doing out here so late could that have been the blimp  why did ithover  in a few seconds, i was approaching the stop sign at my right turn.  isaw movement above and to my left, discovering the line of lights approachingfrom the left.  as i stopped my car at the intersection, the lights stopped andhovered over the road ahead of me, about 100 yards distant.  at this point, ibecame extremely frightened, realising that a ufo was d
content.summary: Six colored llights in a line, rise, hover and cha

content.detailedDescription: At 2130 hours on 2-16-95, while reading, ironically, timithy goods book, abovetop secret, i heard what i thought was a large jet passing overhead.  this isnot unusual, as a small airport is nearby and our home is in the path of flightfor it and the larger hopkins airport, twenty miles west of here.  as icontinued reading, i realized that the jet roar was getting louder andsustaining itself, seemingly overhead.  i glanced out the west window of theroom and saw three strobing lights, like aircraft lights, in the west sky atabout 40 degrees.  the were arranged in a flat triangular shape, two of theclose and the third some distance away.  at arms length, that distance was abouteight inches.  the close lights would strob together, the third strobing afterthe others had cycled off.  the cycle took one second, but the interval betweenthe strobing was about one fifth of a second.  in other words, the three lightswould strob, first the two, then the one, leaving a blank spot for four fifthsof a second.I watched for about one minute, opening the window to listen to the roaringsound, which was comming from the direction of the lights and filled the area. it was a cold night, and i closed the window.  i realized that the lights werenot moving.  i called my wife, who thought they were aircraft, but she soonrealized that they were different, due to the lack of motion.  at that point,she became disturbed, saying i dont want to know what that is and left the room. i picked up a pair of 7 x 35 binoculars at this point and looked for anyoutline of a craft, but could see none.  the space between the lights was thesame as the surrounding sky, flat, gray and overcast.  the lights did not seemto be near the cloud base, as there was no reflection on the clouds.  i guessedthat the lights were around 1,000 up at most.  after 3 minutes of observataion,i noticed a slight movement towards the west.  i continued watching it moveslowly west, this taking around nine more minutes.  it never occured to me tograp my camera, i was just glued to the binoculars.  as it got lower in the sky,and was about to dissapear behind the roof tops, i noticed the lights rotateslightly to the north, then fade back to the west.  at that point, visuals werelost as it went
content.summary: Three strobing, lights accompinaned by loud roarin

content.detailedDescription: Feeding my dogs tabel scraps whith my wife, we were looking up at the stars wilewaiting for them to finish.We were looking at the stars when one of the stars shot out light simillar to ablotorch flame out.Then the star squerted out somthing simillar to toothpastebeing squezed out. then what had sqezed out expanded indiferent directions untilit ended up four different masses. the first was the size of a football feildand about the same shape and about 50 feet thick but the textur and color lookedlike it was made of multin lave. the three smaller masses flew in formationbehind the first, they all had no noise or vibration. i yeld for my children andmyto sons came out i had my cordless 1,000,000 candel power spotlight in my handso i shined it at the largest mass and we could see the light hit it and slowlygo by so i tuned the light off and we watched them slowly fly south east about150 to 300 feet off the grond untill we couldent see them anymore witch tookabout 5 minuts. so we did the logicul thing and called 911 to see if anyone elsehad reported and sigtings, they said no and took are name and told us if theyhurd any thig they would call us back, they never did.

Witness stated that he had taken his step-son to see the eye doctor and that hewas sitting in the office reading a book. as he was sitting there, somethinginside him told him to go outside but he ignored the feeling. again, he got thesame feeling and this time went outside, not knowing why. while outside, herolled a cigarette and as he was rolling the cigarette he heard a loud noisethat sounded like an owl hooting. he could not believe that an owl would behooting in the daytime. as he started to scan the trees looking for the owl, heobserved two cigar-shaped objects in the sky. they appeared to be playing tag,as one would zoom forward and stop until the other one would catch up; then theother one would zoom forward and stop. he watched these cigar-shaped objects forabout 5 minutes, during which time the owl continued to hoot. as he watched thetwo craft, they appeared to go out like a light bulb going on/off - they werethere and then they were not. at this time, he observed two other adults thatwere also watching the objects. he asked them if they were seeing the same thingas he was seeing and they said they were. he ask them for their names but theyrefused to give him that information and got into their vehicle and left. as hewas standing there, he again heard the owl hooting and looked up and observedanother cigar shaped craft. he does not know if it was one the original onesthat he observed or a new one. it too would speed forward and then stop. hestates that after a minute, it shut down like a lightbulb and he could not seeit any more. as he was looking in the sky, he observed 4 jet fighters circle theareas where the craft was observed and then they left heading east.Witness states that he has had numerous ufo sightings in his life and that thiswas the first time that the had seen a cigar shaped object and the first timethat he had seen fighter jets come to where the craft had been.
content.summary: Cigar shaped objects observed in deland, florida

content.detailedDescription: I was on american airlines flight 3030 from san francisco to st. louis ondecember 17, 2002. we were descending into st. louis under partly cloudyconditions and i was seated on the right side of the plane a boeing 757 in anexit row seat 10f. i was looking out the window, watching the ice crystalswithin a cloud as they were illuminated by the planes strobe light, when twobright white lights came out from underneath our aircraft at a distance of7e50 meters approximate since i find it hard to estimate distance when lookingout of a plane under normal conditions, let alone at night in a cloud.The two lights were identical to those found on the tips of aircraft wings,spaced approximately as a wingspan, which led to my initial thought that we hadhad a close call with another aircraft. the lights continued to rise whilemoving away from our plane for about 20 seconds. i mentioned to my seat matethat i thought wed nearly been hit and he looked out and saw the lights as theymoved away.I continued to watch the lights, for about 20 seconds, as they rose to ouraltitude and at an unknown distance but still visible within the cloud. from theframe work of lights on the tips of an aircrafts wings, the lights then rolledto the right 180 degrees, before coming back towards our plane. when firstnoticed, the midpoint of the two lights was centered forward of my seat, and asthey returned they were further back towards the tail of the plane.At that point, i assumed they were the lights of another plane due to theirresemblance with the wingtips lights of aircraft and their behaviour as ifconnected by a rigid body. as they neared our plane, they gained a litlealtitude and disappeared just before they would have passed over our plane.As mentioned, i first assumed the lights to be connected with another aircraft.But, as i thought about it further, i realized that another aircraft would havehad other lights on under those conditions the red and green lights on the topand bottom of the fuselage, the strobe lights, and the headlights. none of thesewere observed. also, with the lights performing a 180 degree roll assuming theywere connected the other craft would have been inverted either when passingunder or over our plane.I havent been able to explain this to myself. maybe someone else from the planesaw something, and thought to report it as well.
content.summary: Lights seen from aircraft window, close encounter

content.detailedDescription: 1. i first noticed the object as i was driving south on stillwater avenue fromorono into the commercialmall area of bangor, me.  on the long stretch ofstillwater there is very little light pollution, and with a clear sky there wasa lot to look at.  since i was travelling south the whole time, i had a clearview of the object for a good 10-15 minutes, without interruption.2. the object was very noticable in that it was where no other pusling redlights typically are, and it behaved differently.  while there are towers in thearea with flashing red lights, this object was intense in a different fashion,appearing to be much higher aircraft height rather than tower height, movingvery slowly.3.  my first thought was that it was a tower light, as they also pulse red...But it appeared to be too distant and far too high.  my second thought was thatit had to be a plane, except that it moved so slowly you really had toconcentrate on the object to realize that it was moving, and that it bore noother of your typical aircraft lighting... no white, no headlight, just solidand intense red.4.  my reaction was interest, primarily... once i had identified it as a pointof interest, i kept my eyes on it the whole 10-15 minutes it took me totravelling from the top of the hill obvious when travelling along stillwaterdown towards and through bangor to the bestbuy near the mall.  aside form havingto pay attention to traffic, i never let the object out of my sight, and evenstood outside my car, in the bestbuy parking lot, observing it 2-5 minutes.5. the object got my attention via its actions... it was quite obviously notattached to a tower as it did move, but it seemed to be far too slow to be aplane, even a helicopter of which there are few to spare in this rural area. though this is only a guess, id think that had i been standing in one spot thewhole time of observation, the object may have only moved a few degrees acrossthe southern sky the whole time observed.  of particular note was theoscillation of the object... there was a definite but changing pattern to itspulsing... it went from staying a solid red for a good 30 seconds towards itsfirst off state and then sequentially speeding up to about 1hz before beginningto slow back towards another 30 second solid red.6. i finally walked into bestbuy, spent about 10 minutes inside, and came outand almost immediately reacquired the object... but at that point it was soclose to the artificial horizon signs, buildings, etc that i only saw it forabout another 30 seconds befor
content.summary: Variable oscillating red light, very slow mover

content.detailedDescription: I was about 10 yrs old i thinkit was about 20 years ago. i was in salt lake cityutah where my house was. i was just walk around on front of my house doingnothing. i just happened saw there were two objects very long rectangler whitelike pearl looking and it stays close to each other like 11 and have never moveaway from each other. i am deaf myself and i was not understanding the worldaround me behind eduacated at that timei was just curious and wondering what itwas and confused. i knew it was not plane or anything that i have seen before. ihad very little understanding about aliens and ufo at that time so i justthought it might be possible that the earth has strange way of nature make itsfloating objects. it just keep on moving and hoovering from south to north realyslow. when it gets smaller and i hurried to get my mom to witcness it as welland went inside but mom was not around so i went back outside and it was alreadydisappeared or might be farther and smaller that i couldnt find it anymore. fora years that i have always remember it and fear by it. i always felt that i wasbeing watched that i was not allow to tell anybody about it. sometime i wonderif i had telepathy from them but never sure of it. i have had nightmares once inawhile after that happens. now it not much anymore but i do still feel that theydo remember me very well. i just cant explain it thur email because i am notgood in english. i am telling you 100 per cent truth that i know it somethingout there what i saw adn have no doubt in my heart. i cant give accurracte whatyear it was because i never understood the year when i was little so it wasabout around 1982. i hope you can be of help and thank you for your time. pleasedont remove me and ask me any questions that i will answer to all with 100 percent truth with all my heart.

I was with some friends and my boyfriend up on the ridge above the kassanpeninsula taking pictures to send to my parents of the ferry route that we take when we come from ketchikan. i had a strange feeling because of the heights andwas interested in this cedar snag for some reason. i took two or three picturesof it and then didnt think anymore about it. well since then i have movedseveral times and have gotten a computer through a grant  and was looking atpictures to put on my t-shirts when i saw something on the picture and decidedto throw it away and then i decided to take  a closer look at it with amagnifying glass. i then put it in the scanner and blew it up and that is when isaw the same stick figure that i saw in the clip of a man named jose who hadtaken a bunch of them in a deep hole where they were climbing into. i have beensearching the internet now for  two years and happened to be watching on thescience channel and  there was the clipping where he went to mufon to have andelderly expert examine his film. i have the print and the negative .I am in theprocess of moving my house around but it is in with my photos because i haveblown it up for someone else to see.  i hope this is the right place to inquireabout this strange little stick object that appeared in my photo . i know it isnot the camera because i have more than one photo of the snag and the stickobject only appears in one of them

I lived with my parents out in the country, about 6 miles out of a small towncalled burkburnett.  i worked the late shift at a hospital and was heading homeat around 1130 at night.  i was all alone on the 2-lane highway that led to myhouse and about 3 or more miles from town when i suddenly noticed my carengulfed in blue lights.  i thought that a police officer had been hidingsomewhere and was going to pull me over.  but, when i looked in my rearviewmirror i saw nothing behind me.  i looked to my left southerly, and saw  largeblue lights in the field next to me.  i couldnt take my eyes off of the objectand knew that it was not an oil rig, plane, or helicopter because it wasstationary just above the ground and very large.  i remember looking down at myspeedometer, flooring my car out of fear, and then looking back again to wherethe object had been.  it was pitch black.  from what i did see, the craft hadthe bluest lights i had ever seenmoving from left to right over and over, pulsating and very bright.  my car waslit up, as the lights relfected off of the exterior and on the inside of myvehicle.  i drove home as fast as i could, looking up above me and around me,afraid that i would be taken.  i know it was something not normal.P.S.  i would like to also add that i had experiences afterwards in my bedroomand ended up taking a visit to a therapist about my experience.  i will sharethat if requested.
We caught the object on camera for seventeen minutes from our front porch.

Evening after school, saw the orb to the sw, was shaken so badly i ran intoglass in a sliding glass door did not break. wppl radio in blue ridge ga said iswas a weather ballon the next morning, the weather ballon outran what appeard as2 f-111s that intercepted it from the south, probably from dobbins afb. i amhoping you have other data on this event because i remember 2 counties gilmer,fannin, and maybe pickens county saw this thing. please let me know if you haveand exact date on this, in the event of other reports have reported on this one.It is my intent to find more witnesses due to the fact that this has bugged meall these years. now im 40 now and feel that time is being lost to look at thisevent further.Douglas v. espy 45 south cedar lane chickamauga,ga 30707 i have no problemsharing my info with those others who recall.  -doug- ke4gqe
I was riding in the car and looking at the sky when i noticed a light in thesky. i thought it was a star at first but then it moved around the sky and thendisapeared.I stared at it and said nothing

Countryusastate_provincetxthe three of us were traveling n.E. along a two lane road around 2315 hrs. whenwe observed a bright light in the middle of the roadway approx.14 mileahead.Isaid to chris,what is that his reply was,maybe its a police helicopterhe,chris,told me to turn around.I did so. as we began to head s.W.,i told christo look behind us because the light was now moving towards us.As i increasedspeed toward 90mph the light overtook us. the light proceeded toparallel ourcourse.Between us was a row of trees.Itold chris that there was an opening inthe trees just ahead of us and that i was going to turn left toward this lightwhen we got to the clearing and stop the car with my brights shined on them.Whenwe got to the clearing i did turn toward the light.I then got out of the car asif to challenge the light. what seemed liked seconds later the light proceededto travel straight up until i could no longer see it.It made no sond of ascentsuch as acopter or jet would do.William asked me to get back into the car so wecould go .On our way home we stopped at a gas station to buy gas .When chris andi walked inside the man said,you fellas are lucky.I was just about to close.Ilooked at my watch which read 2320 and asked what time do you close hhis replywas 2400 which by his wallclock was 2min. away.I asked chris what time his watchread ,his reply was 2320 but it stopped.So when i looked back at my own watchthat is when i noticed that mine also had stopped.  i have information which ineed to get rid of. memmories who do i need to talk to if not you. my friendsare now dead ..Am i next                                                                                                                                                                        600 n.Henderson ft.Worth tx. 76107countytarrantnear_town_or_citynewarksiteruralskyclearcloud_covercloud_covertotal_witnesses3mufon_reportees0witness_locationgrouped

Christmas eve 1978, around 2am, i was traveling westbound on spring mtn rd inlas vegas, nv after dropping a friend off after we had been out for the evening,and a midnight christmas breakfast.  i turned right onto valley view blvdheading north, and as i was coming up to a radio  tower on my left, i looked up,noticed redgreenwhite lights and thought, oh how cute, someone decorated thetower for christmas.  i then turned left onto pennwood heading west to go home. as i was about halfway between valley view and approaching the 4-way stop signat arville, i noticed to my left south that the redgreenwhite lights were nolonger at the radio tower but seemed to be pacing me.  there was no sound, and icould not make out any shape whatsoever.  i just saw the lights - i cannotrecall any particular configuration - just a red, a green and a white light.  itwas definitely not a plane, nor a helicopter. as low as the lights were, had itbeen a helicopter, it would have been very loud.  when i slowed down, it sloweddown.  i stopped at the 4-way stop, proceeded straight across arville and abouta short block down, turned left into my apt complex wood creek apts, which werestill under construction.  in fact, only the townhouses on the street and mybuilding of 1br apts were complete.  everything else was under construction andthe complex was quite dark.  as i turned in, i noticed the lights were still tomy left - hovering.  still no sound.  i had to make an immediate right turn, andtraveled about 100-150 feet to my parking space, turned right into my coveredparking space.  turned my car off and stepped out and locked the car.  as iwalked out from underneath the cover, i looked up i would have been facingsouth, towards the sidewalk to my apt and saw the lights almost directly aboveme 300-500 feet up and slightly left.  i turned slightly more to my left eastbecause i also noticed that there was a single, but very bright white light thatwas positioned in the sky in the vicinity of the moon, but much closer to earth- it was just that the light was in that area of the sky at the time.  i startedto walk towards the sidewalk but i looked down what was going to be the rest ofthe parking lot, which would have been perpendicula

I was driving out of my development heading for work at 555 am. when i first sawthe object i thought it was a blimp completely illuminated in the distance. as idrove towards the end of my street, the object became much more clear and theshape became much more defined. i believe that the object was moving towards mydevelopment as i was driving towards the object. the object was a perfectrectangle tilted approximately 20-30 degrees long axis horizontal. the objectwas completely illuminated to the point where all i could see was a white lightin the shape of a rectangle. if i had to guess at a distance id say the objectwas between 1000 and 2500 away from me. it lit up the sky like a full moon doeson a dark night it was still pitch black outside. i turned onto another streetand continued driving while looking out the window at the object. it was movingparallel to the street i was on and about the same speed 45 mph. for a splitsecond my line of sight was blocked by some trees. when i could see again, theobject was much farther away several miles and all i could see was a very smallilluminated rectangle.

I was driving on interstate 10 east from burbank, cal to johnson city, tn. itwas 300 am and i was on the eastern outskirts of schreveport, la. there waslittle traffic and it was exceptionally clear, and i noticed to my right high inthe sky a movement of light. at first i thought it was a star twinkling, but irealized quickly that a two toned light sort of cone shaped descended rapidly toa position just to the upper right of my vehicle. it stopped in mid air for asecond or two, then started drifting south west downward behind some trees. iattempted to pull off but the guardrail did not allow a space large enough topull off. the road veered to the left and i lost sight of the object and myposition. the top of the cone was a brilliant radiating white light with thebottom two thirds a bright glowing green color. the colors were so bright theyseemed surreal. it all happened in less than a minute. it was astonishing and icould not settle down for a long time. there is a military base there so itcould have been associated with that.I logged on to the local papers when ireturned to tn to see if it had been seen by others. i called the times butcould not verify anything. i am a member of mufon and have investigated severalsightings and an abduction in tn. i own several businesses and am not active inthis subject. this is my only sighting, but it certainly got me wide awake inmore ways than one.
content.summary: Cone shaped lights over schreveport, la

content.detailedDescription: Wed. dec. 11, 2002, pacific grove, california, 1230 a.M.  clear starry sky.Looked up to constellation orion, in south sky.  below orion, saw dull orangelight slowly moving northnorthwest, towards pacific grove and pacific ocean.Moving at speed slightly slower than a satellite, slightly larger in size than asatellite, and the color definitely different than a satellite.  seemed to betravelling low enough to be in earths atmosphere, not high enough to be inspace.  kept observing to see if it were an airplane.  no flashing aircraftlights, just the dull orange light.  from start of observation, craft moved inone line of direction, fairly straightahead but with a gentle curve westward,and pace was slow and steady.  a barely visible vapor trail was being leftbehind the moving craft.  craft travelled this path for approximately 3 to 5minutes.  then craft slowed, hovered for a moment, then moved forward.  duringthis change in motion, a smaller dull orange light, approx. 14 to 18 the size oforiginal light, moved from the back of original light, moving south, away fromoriginal light, for a small distance, then disappeared.  original light movednorthnorthwest for a bit longer with slower, unsteady pace.  then light dimmed,brightened briefly, then disappeared.  total time approx. 6-7 minutes.Thoughts, feelings  when i first looked up toward orion and saw the light,  thepath and speed of the light seemed like a satellite.  but the light was larger,with a different color, and moving slower, than a satellite.  then i noticed thevapor trail behind the light.  the trail remained in the sky after the light haddisappeared, slowly dispersing.  when the light slowed, and hoveredwavered, thenmoved forward at varying speed, that took away the possibility of an airplane orsatellite.  the smaller light coming out of the back of the original light wasdefinitely different.  while observing, was enjoying the experience, even wavedhello to the light, though it was way up there.There was a missile test from vandenberg afb sometime in the night, so hope thiswas not part of that.  the slow and odd travel of this craft seems completelydistinct from missiles and interceptors.
content.summary: Dull orange ufos above monterey peninsula

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at my cubicle at work which is located next to large plexiglasswindows. i was day-dreaming and i looked outside and into the sky where i saw adistant object that at the time looked to be floating around, resembling abird,which is what i thought it was to begin with. i was staring at the birdpondering what it must be like to be able to fly to such amazing heights when irealized that the objects structure did not resemble a bird at all. it seemedmore block-like or cylinder-like if the cylinder were lying horizontal, orpossibly even saucer shaped. i then got up and went to stand at the window totry to get a closer look when the object began to descend in a way totallyunlike that of any bird or plane that i have ever seen. it began descendingdownward in what appeared to be a straight line. the object was movingrelatively slowly and appeared quite distant. distance in height if not length.It seemed to be black in color though that could be due to the distance i wasfrom the object. i watched to see if it would disappeared behind an approachingcloud but it remained in view as it moved over the cloud, still moving slowlydown toward the horizon. it eventually did disappear behind a cloud effectivelyleaving my frame of view. i did however seem to lose the object for briefseconds on a couple of occasions before finding it again as it descended,superimposed over the clouds, but i contribute that to my own eyes.The only reason i am reporting this sighting at all is  because of its shapedistinguishing it from any bird or plane i have ever witnessed, and the way itdescended. outside of vtol craft i have never heard of any other craft to tothis. it also seemed smaller than a commercial airliner though again, it couldbe the distance causing a distortion of my perception. i know there have beenmany reported sightings all across the world recently and i am also curious toknow if there have been any other sightings in my area. any information as tothe possiblity of the object being extra-terrestrial would be appreciated and ifthere is anymore information i can givethough it would be limited if anything atalli would be more than happy to share.Regards,josh bjerke

We where in the car headed south on old route 64 at sun set when my mother and inoticed a object headed nw. the object had 2 flashing lights white and a scarletcolor.At first we thought it was a plane but as we turn right headed west itfollowed the car for about 4 miles and changed color to a bright scarlet color.As we turn north into my grand mothers driveway which was about 400 ft long itfollowed us and disapeared over the tree line.We staid at grand moms for about30 mins. and headed home we just got back to the hwy and turn east when when momyelled out there it is. it was hovering over some trees, look like a big football glowing a scarlet color mom puled of the road and just stared at it me atthe time i was scared to death and kept screaming for her to go but she just sitthere and about 15 in she drove of the object was there when we left we wenthome picked up dad and came back but it had gone.This is just 1 of many strange things that we saw while living in pearson ga.If u have any comments please contact me

Me and my wife were driving along a back road, just talking. it was clear andpretty day. we were heading west and you couldnt notice these two lights in thesky. i already new what they were, because i had seen it before one night. i askmy wife did she see them she said yes. i told her that  is what i seen onenight. i couldnt beleive it, i am actually seeing it again. i went into town andasked people that were standing out did they see them no one seemed to notice.The first time i seen it was a few years earlier. i was laying out early onemorning3am-4amin my girlfriends driveway. at first, i thought it was a shootingstar, but it didnt burn out. then i thought it was a plane, maybe a jet. it wasmoving quickly. but i know that planes have red  blue lights on the wings and ithink a red light on the tail. this object had no other colored lights. i didntthink anything strange untill it started glowing really bright. it went fromwhat looked like a star to a street light in the sky. at that point i sat up, iwas laying on my back. i asked my girlfriend did she see that plane go into acloud and started glowing. i probably sat another hour starring into the skywaiting for it to come out the clouds. it never did.It kinda scared me. ithought it may have been a space shuttle blowing up. the light in the sky was sointense, it put you in mind of the beams you hear people joking about comingfrom spaceships. the one that comes down and picks you up but only it was in thesky. that made me wonder if i had been abducted. but i know that i didnt feelany different or feel like i had been anywhere. my girlfriend didnt seeanything. the 2nd time i seen it me and my now wife was traveling a back road.We were taking the long way into town. about 3 mile out of town i seen them inthe sky. i touched my wife and told her ther they are, thats what i seen thatnight. i had been telling her about it for years. there were 2 softball sizefromwhere we was bright light in the sky. we both seen them. they zig zag a littlebit in front of us, just out of sight to tell what they really were. then onewent into a cloud then glowed and dissapeared. the other just glowed in the openand dissapeared. we both made sure we really saw what we did, or storiesmatched. i didnt tell, her but again i wondered had we been abducted. but ithink they were just letting me know that i really seen what i had seen thatnight. i had tears in

I had this experience when i was college in bloomington.  i cant be certain ofthe dates because it was several years ago.  it was most likely like 10 or 11 atnight.I was on highway 46.  i was somewhere between where 59 intersects with 46 andriley.  i believe that i was near the cory area or approaching riley.It was a clear night and there was some moonlight as i remember.  so visibilityin the night sky was good.  as i looked ahead on the left hand side of the roadin the distance i saw a dark object in the night sky.  i thought it was a lowflying airplane.  but, it seemed pretty low to the ground and i couldnt yet makeout any lights.  i was curious about this dark spot and kept my eye on it as iwent down the highway.  the dark spot remainded stationary and became larger thecloser i got to it.  i could see the dark object wasnt far from the road on theleft hand side.  as i got closer, i began to slow down so i could better see theobject.  there were two cars in front of me and they also slowed down.As i got closer to the object, i could make out the form - triangular.  i couldeven see white lights coming from what i thought were cockpit lights.  as i goteven closer, i could see that these were recentangular windows at one end of thetriangular object.  as i came right up on the object, i pulled off onto theright hand side shoulder of the road.  so did the two cars ahead of me.  irolled down my driver side window and looked squarely at the object.It was 300-500 yards away.  it was triangular.  it was dark.  it had white lightcoming out of the rectangular windows.  i seem to vaguely remember it had someother lights.  the object was hovering.  actually, i dont think the object movedfrom the first moment that i spotted it.  it was only a few hundred feet up inthe air.  it was large.  ive seen the stealth bomber at the indy 500.  i wouldsay it was in that size range.Up to this point, i was curious.  as i got closer, i became more and moreinquisitive - i wanted to know what this strange thing was.  as i began toexamine the object in a fairly close proximity, i became distrubed.  first offall, it was hovering.  that didnt seem right.  then i realized that i didnt hearit making any noise.  at that point in time, i became afraid.  the two cars thathad pulled over in front of me were quickly pulling back onto the road and sodid i.  we all proceeded away at a high rate of speed.  i distinctly rememberinga feeling that what i was seeing - wasnt right.  i felt it wasnt something thatfor wh
content.summary: Dark triangular object seen next to 46 in cory are

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on a large rock at the beach staring at the sky, and i noticedwhat appeared to be a bright star, but it moved very slowly and was closer thanit first appeared.  it got closer, but no sound, and no colored flashing lightslike an airplane has.  it got fairly close.  it looked like an egg shapedobject, with an aura around it of whiteblue-white light that got brighter as itgot closer, but never flashed, and never had a sound. it was heading up thecoast northwards and sort of inland, stopped, and reversed direction withoutturning.  it came very close, within 1000 feel i think, but was hard to tellcause the light was so bright i couldnt tell.  the object didnt appear to haveany windows or doors, but the light ring around it was so bright it was hard totell.  nothing seemed reflective.  during this time, i tried to use my cellphone to call a friend, but it just said it was searching for service, and iusually have great signal there.  when the object got closest, it stopped andhovered for like 45 seconds, without a sound.  it then went almost straight up,stopped and dissapeared so fast, i couldnt beleive it  i felt very mezmerizedwhile watching it, and then afterwards i felt very uneasy about it.  i didnttell anyone about it until now, cause i guess people would think i was strangeor something.
content.summary: Saw bright lighted object with no sound
